attributes.action: Repeal the Inheritance tax on Family farms and agricultural land.
attributes.additional_details: Without the government help, by repealing the Inheritance tax placed on small family farms, it makes almost certain many farms will get broken up and therefore the affect this will have on the food chain.
attributes.background: Make it possible for Family farms to be handed down to the children and family of Farmers. So they are able to continue farming without breaking up their farm to pay a Tax!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700138
